plot: German is on his way home when a stranger approaches him on the bus and leaves him a note predicting his future death. He soon discovers he's in the middle of something big, something that will put himself and the whole humanity in risk.
title: Reacción en Cadena
plot_es: German is on his way home when a stranger approaches him on the bus and leaves him a note predicting his future death. He soon discovers he's in the middle of something big, something that will put himself and the whole humanity in risk.
plot_en: German is on his way home when a stranger approaches him on the bus and leaves him a note predicting his future death. He soon discovers he's in the middle of something big, something that will put himself and the whole humanity in risk.
